snippet.title: The Little Glass Bottle - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1751590
Or GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/dagon_the_little_glass_bottle_dlc
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/nZxjzs5rGC
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/bit_golem/
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitgolem
Request review key via Keymailer: https://www.keymailer.co/g/games/124074

Join Captain William Jones and his party of men on a treasure hunt adventure! The Little Glass Bottle is the second official DLC for Dagon, based on the first surviving story by the master of weird fiction, written when he was… 7 years old! Take some rest from cosmic horror and eldritch underwater beings and experience the other, more humorous, side of young H. P. Lovecraft!

All profits from DLCs are donated to humanitarian aid.
More information: https://twitter.com/bit_golem/status/1497627413865394178

Trailer Music by Potion Audio
Read by Paxton Ables
